definitions: a function of the coefficients and variables of a given function which is invariant under a linear transformation except for a factor equal to a power of the determinant of the transformation.
shortDefinitions: function of coefficients and variables of given function which is invariant under linear transformation except for factor

definitions: changing in such a way that mathematical interrelations with another simultaneously changing quantity or set of quantities remain unchanged.
shortDefinitions: changing in such way that mathematical interrelations with another simultaneously changing quantity

definitions: of, having the properties of, or relating to a covariant.
shortDefinitions: relating to or having properties of covariant
